registry.title: Content Disposition Values and Parameters
registry.note: In there is a discussion of the "Content-Disposition" header field and the description of the initial values allowed in this header. Additional values may be registered with the IANA following the procedures in section 9 of .

registry.title: Content Disposition Values
registry.registration_rule: Standards Track or IESG-Approved Experimental RFC

record.name: inline
record.description: displayed automatically

record.name: attachment
record.description: user controlled display

record.name: form-data
record.description: process as form response

record.name: signal
record.description: tunneled content to be processed silently

record.name: alert
record.description: the body is a custom ring tone to alert the user

record.name: icon
record.description: the body is displayed as an icon to the user

record.name: render
record.description: the body should be displayed to the user

record.name: recipient-list-history
record.description: the body contains a list of URIs that indicates the recipients of the request

record.name: session
record.description: the body describes a communications session, for example, an RFC2327 SDP body

record.name: aib
record.description: Authenticated Identity Body

record.name: early-session
record.description: the body describes an early communications session, for example, and [RFC2327] SDP body

record.name: recipient-list
record.description: The body includes a list of URIs to which URI-list services are to be applied.

record.name: notification
record.description: the payload of the message carrying this Content-Disposition header field value is an Instant Message Disposition Notification as requested in the corresponding Instant Message.

record.name: by-reference
record.description: The body needs to be handled according to a reference to the body that is located in the same SIP message as the body.

record.name: info-package
record.description: The body contains information associated with an Info Package

record.name: filename
record.description: name to be used when creating file

record.name: creation-date
record.description: date when content was created

record.name: modification-date
record.description: date when content was last modified

record.name: read-date
record.description: date when content was last read

record.name: size
record.description: approximate size of content in octets

record.name: name
record.description: original field name in form

record.name: voice
record.description: type or use of audio content

record.name: handling
record.description: whether or not processing is required
body must be understood
body may be silently discarded
